Interpolating Values

Double curly brackets let you access a value that youâ€™ve stored globally or in a Brick property. These are generally less performant than Slots, but are sometimes necessary for things like href or src attributes.

<img src="{{FeaturedImage}}" />

Expressions

Adding the @ symbol before double curly brackets @{{...}} will tell Ingrid to evaluate their contents as a Javascript expression.
